body: Your bleed attack is bloody and dangerous.
name: Blood Beak
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Tengus/New Racial Rules/Tengu Feats/Blood Beak

sections.body: Base attack bonus +5, natural weapon racial trait, tengu.
sections.name: Prerequisites

sections.body: Increase the damage of your beak attack to 1d6. Furthermore, when you confirm a critical hit with your beak attack, you also deal 1 point of bleed damage.
sections.name: Benefit

sections.body: The bleed effect from this feat stacks with that of the Bleeding Critical feat and similar effects, adding 1 point to your bleed damage.
sections.name: Special
